title: Bug 4121: JarExporter out of Sync issue
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar file in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to avoid the out of sync message.
SR:
1. Open the project directory.
2. Export the project as a jar file.
3. Place the exported jar file in the same directory.
4. Overwrite the exported jar file.
5. Verify that an out of sync message is displayed.
